_meta.description: This file contains a serialized version of schema entities for drift.

data.name: offline_queue_delete_trigger
data.sql:
CREATE TRIGGER offline_queue_delete_trigger
AFTER DELETE ON offline_queue
FOR EACH ROW
BEGIN
    DELETE FROM offline_queue_files
    WHERE offline_queue_id = OLD.id;
END;

data.name: offline_queue_users_delete_trigger
data.sql:
CREATE TRIGGER offline_queue_users_delete_trigger
AFTER DELETE ON users
FOR EACH ROW
BEGIN
    DELETE FROM offline_queue
    WHERE user = OLD.id;
END;

columns.name: id
columns.customConstraints: GENERATED ALWAYS AS (json_extract(data, '$.id')) VIRTUAL NOT NULL

columns.name: collection_id
columns.customConstraints: GENERATED ALWAYS AS (json_extract(data, '$.collectionId')) VIRTUAL NOT NULL

columns.name: collection_name
columns.customConstraints: GENERATED ALWAYS AS (json_extract(data, '$.collectionName')) VIRTUAL NOT NULL

columns.name: created
columns.customConstraints: GENERATED ALWAYS AS (json_extract(data, '$.created')) VIRTUAL NOT NULL

columns.name: updated
columns.customConstraints: GENERATED ALWAYS AS (json_extract(data, '$.updated')) VIRTUAL NOT NULL

data.name: user_records
data.sql: CREATE VIEW user_records AS SELECT *, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.user') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.user') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS user, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.uid') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.uid') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS uid FROM records;

data.name: analytics
data.sql: CREATE VIEW analytics AS SELECT *, CAST(json_extract(data, '$.type') AS TEXT) AS type, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.metadata') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.metadata') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS metadata, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.version') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.version') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS version, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.platform') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.platform') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS platform FROM user_records WHERE collection_name = 'analytics';

data.name: user_purchases
data.sql: CREATE VIEW user_purchases AS SELECT *, CAST(json_extract(data, '$.product_id') AS TEXT) AS product_id, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.platform') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.platform') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS platform, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.amount') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.amount') AS REAL) ELSE NULL END AS amount, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.purchase_id') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.purchase_id') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS purchase_id FROM user_records WHERE collection_name = 'user_purchases';

data.name: user_library
data.sql: CREATE VIEW user_library AS SELECT *, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.hymn_id') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.hymn_id') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS hymn_id, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.playlist_id') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.playlist_id') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS playlist_id, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.topic_id') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.topic_id') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS topic_id, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.stakeholder_id') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.stakeholder_id') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS stakeholder_id FROM user_records WHERE collection_name = 'user_library';

data.name: user_playlist_library
data.sql: CREATE VIEW user_playlist_library AS SELECT *, CAST(json_extract(data, '$.playlist_id') AS TEXT) AS playlist_id FROM user_records WHERE collection_name = 'user_library' AND json_extract(data, '$.playlist_id') IS NOT NULL;

data.name: local_playlists
data.sql: CREATE VIEW local_playlists AS SELECT *, CAST(json_extract(data, '$.name') AS TEXT) AS name, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.description') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.description') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS description, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.public') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.public') AS INT) ELSE NULL END AS public, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.medly') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.medly') AS INT) ELSE NULL END AS medly, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.supplement') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.supplement') AS INT) ELSE NULL END AS supplement, CASE WHEN json_extract(data, '$.event') IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(json_extract(data, '$.event') AS TEXT) ELSE NULL END AS event FROM user_records WHERE collection_name = 'public_playlists' OR collection_name = 'playlists';

data.name: playlists
data.sql: CREATE VIEW playlists AS SELECT * FROM local_playlists WHERE collection_name = 'playlists';

data.name: public_playlists
data.sql: CREATE VIEW public_playlists AS SELECT * FROM local_playlists WHERE collection_name = 'public_playlists' OR(collection_name = 'playlists' AND public = 1);

hymn_portions_delete_portion

hymns_fts
data.create_virtual_stmt: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE "hymns_fts" USING fts5(title, number, tuneName, startingKey, beatPattern, startingPitch, startingBeat, startingPitchDirection, timeSignature, complexTimeSignature, content=hymns, content_rowid=id)

data.name: hymns_fts_insert
hymns_fts_update
data.sql:
CREATE TRIGGER hymns_fts_update
AFTER UPDATE ON hymns
BEGIN
    UPDATE hymns_fts
    SET title = new.title, 
        number = new.number, 
        tuneName = new.tuneName, 
        startingKey = new.startingKey, 
        beatPattern = new.beatPattern, 
        startingPitch = new.startingPitch, 
        startingBeat = new.startingBeat, 
        startingPitchDirection = new.startingPitchDirection, 
        timeSignature = new.timeSignature, 
        complexTimeSignature = new.complexTimeSignature
    WHERE rowid = old.ROWID;
END;

data.name: hymns_fts_delete
user_records_users_delete_trigger
data.sql:
CREATE TRIGGER user_records_users_delete_trigger
AFTER DELETE ON users
FOR EACH ROW
BEGIN
    DELETE FROM user_records
    WHERE user = OLD.id;
END;

data.name: records_fts
data.create_virtual_stmt: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE "records_fts" USING fts5(data, content=records, content_rowid=id)

data.name: records_fts_insert
records_fts_update
data.sql:
CREATE TRIGGER records_fts_update
AFTER UPDATE ON records
BEGIN
    UPDATE records_fts
    SET data = new.data
    WHERE rowid = old.ROWID;
END;

data.name: records_fts_delete
